meta.label: Parameter set for instance configuration
meta.description: Configure how to connect to a remote Dataiku Govern instance.

pluginParams.name: use_govern_integration_settings
pluginParams.label: Use Dataiku Govern integration settings
pluginParams.description: Choose which Dataiku Govern instance to use: if unchecked, you must specify the host and API Key of the instance below; if checked (only work with DSS v13.3.2+), it uses the Dataiku Govern instance configured in the integration settings of the general settings and its admin API Key

params.name: impersonate_govern_user
params.label: Impersonate a Govern user
params.description: Leave empty if you want to connect with the API Key access, or, if the API Key is admin, you can fill it with a user of the Dataiku Govern instance to impersonate them.
